version.changelog:
v1.0.7: Frost contour effect on text - Icy outline/contour around text using text-stroke - Multi-directional shadow creates frosted border effect - Contour thickness scales with cold intensity (1px to 2.5px) - Lighter blue-white on top, deeper blue on bottom
v1.0.6: Snow accumulation on text - Snow piles build up on top of text elements (playrate, BPM, tempo) - Accumulation rate proportional to snowstorm intensity - Gradual melting when warming up - Improved text visibility with white glow and dark shadow contrast
v1.0.5: Snowfall/Snowstorm effects for slow speeds - Canvas-based snowfall particle system - Three snowflake visual types (circles, stars, detailed) - Intensity scales particle count (50-500), size, speed - Dynamic wind with gusting for natural movement - Fog overlay at high intensity for blizzard effect - Gradual fade out when warming up
v1.0.4: Enhanced GameHUD fire effects - Doom-style fire simulation with 38-color palette - Fire intensity proportional to playrate (1.3x-4.0x) - Flame height scales with intensity (150px-400px) - Text glow effects at high playrates - Calculated tempo display (BPM x playrate) - Feed cards auto-hide after 4 seconds - Fixed avatar error handling
v1.0.3: GameHUD - Gamified playrate display - Retro arcade + neon cyberpunk themed HUD - Speedometer gauge with animated needle - Rhythm game style beat indicator - Fire/ice effects at speed thresholds - Particle effects and screen shake - Change feed showing playrate history - Playrate display in Teleprompter
v1.0.2: Enhanced web interfaces - Teleprompter: Full settings panel with animation controls, colors, font size - NowPlaying: Settings panel with layout options, slow pan animation for cover art - All settings persist via localStorage - URL generator for OBS browser sources
v1.0.1: Session scaffolding - Asks to create missing LYRICS/SONGS tracks on startup
v1.0.0: Initial release - Teleprompter with lyrics display, beat indicator, BPM - NowPlaying with cover art extraction - Playlist queue management - OBS-ready web interfaces with settings panels

v1.0.3: Browser-based setup guide - Opens interactive setup guide in browser - Visual step-by-step instructions with clickable links
v1.0.2: Improved setup experience - Added double-width text icon (text_wide) for toolbar button
v1.0.1: Fixed configuration format - Fixed toolbar command using proper _RS hash format
v1.0.0: Initial release - Adds Live Performance Server to main toolbar

Initial release
Song library indexer for Playlist system.

v1.0.0: Initial release - Twitch channel point rewards for playrate control - Streamlabs donation integration - StreamElements donation integration - Configurable rewards, costs, cooldowns - Web config panel at localhost:9030 - Proportional BPM scaling - Auto-reset option
